mapper.select: SELECT id FROM eqpt_material WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT inId FROM eqpt_inrepository WHERE inId = #{inId}
SELECT outId FROM eqpt_outrepository WHERE outId = #{outId}
SELECT inId FROM eqpt_inrepository WHERE inId LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{inId},'%'))
SELECT DISTINCT ID_ AS inId FROM w_ywcgddhtpsd

SELECT w_cgmx1.F_WLBH AS materialId,w_cgmx1.F_WLMC AS materialName,w_cgmx1.F_GGXH AS spec,w_cgmx1.F_CGSL AS inNum,w_cgmx1.F_WLMC AS 'check',w_cgmx1.F_WLMC AS sn,(eqpt_material.unit) AS unit,eqpt_material.remark AS remark FROM eqpt_material,w_cgmx1 WHERE REF_ID_ = #{wdbh} AND eqpt_material.id = w_cgmx1.F_WLBH
SELECT w_ywcgddhtpsd.F_XMBH AS projId,w_ywcgddhtpsd.F_XMMC AS projName FROM w_ywcgddhtpsd WHERE ID_ = #{wdbh}
